description: Fully renovated junior one bedroom apartment in a great Upper East Side location with city views near the Queensboro Bridge.  Walk in and enjoy a beautiful and bright kitchen with all new stainless steel appliances and a full size washer dryer.  Conveniently located near MTA Trains 4, 5, 6, N, W, R (59th and 3rd/Lex); Trains F (63rd and Lexington); Trains E (53rd and Lexington); and Central Park.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  No pets allowed.
name: Prime Upper East Side Junior 1-Bed Apartment
